snippet.title: Super Mario Galaxy (from Nvidia Shield) on Dolphin and more...
snippet.description:
=== DOWNLOADS ===
ISO-patcher: https://tiny.one/SMGNvidia-ISOPatcher
(Use this if you want to play on Dolphin, USB-Loader, WiiFlow and other applications that play/convert games from ISO format)

4K texture pack: https://tiny.one/SMGNvidia-4KTexPack
(To use with Dolphin)

Riivolution-patcher: https://tiny.one/SMGNvidia-RiivoPatcher
(Obviously for use with Riivolution. By far the easiest method)

=== INFORMATION ===
On March 22nd 2018 Nintendo and Nvidia released Super Mario Galaxy on chinese Nvidia Shield devices. That port of the game received some visual upgrades, as well as 1080p support. This is also the only way to play the first game of the Super Mario Galaxy duology in simplified Chinese. Wouldn't it be great if you could play this visually enhanced version of Super Mario Galaxy on Dolphin or a real Wii?

This project called «Super Mario Galaxy: Nvidia Shield TV» takes assets from the Nvidia Shield version and applies them to official Wii releases of Super Mario Galaxy. The assets were slightly edited for compatibility reasons but ensure an identical look and feeling. The included patchers and the texture pack for use with Dolphin are made by us.

The first 30 seconds of the trailer are a high-quality remake of Nvidia's own trailer for the game. Check it out here: https://weibo.com/6154885380/G8y23yTnm

=== RNVW01 (Developer ISO) ===
CRC32:    d4509a24
MD5:    f20526ef9e5e883cf6f5183f0cc1e505
SHA-1:    7526869b1dfc097e565d6d0c120da79c857a934a

=== CREDITS ===
Luma48, Islender, Super Hackio

=== RECOMMENDED MODS WE ARE NOT AFFILIATED WITH ===
New Super Mario Bros. Wii - ported UI from Nvidia Shield (by Moukrea)
https://forums.dolphin-emu.org/Thread-new-super-mario-bros-wii-exclusive-nvidia-shield’s-china-release-ported-ui

Super Mario Galaxy 1 HD Texture Mod (by CDAMJC)
https://forums.dolphin-emu.org/Thread-super-mario-galaxy-1-hd-texture-mod
